title.rendered: 5 Ways to Live Like a Local, Midweek in Toronto

slim_seo.title: 5 Ways to Live Like a Local, Midweek in Toronto  - The Drake
slim_seo.description: Think the city only comes alive on weekends? Think again. Locals happen to know that Toronto does some of its greatest work during the work week. And The Drake Hotel is your insider to discover the best of what the city has to offer, Monday to Thursday (of course, you might just want to stay longer.) Like any good insider, we’ve got perks to help you get the most out of your week. Here’s why a weeknight stay with us is the perfect way to live like a true Queen Wester:
